questionTitle: My father, Thierry, makes roads and bridges.He's ___ engineer
My mother, Jeannette helps people who are sick. She's ___ doctor
My brother Telesphore catches robbers. He's ___ policeman
Telesphore's got a gun and he wears ___ uniform
My sister Sonia cuts people's hair. She's ___ hairdresser
My other brother, Gambetta, writes books. He's ___ writer.
Gambetta is very lazy. He only works ___ hour a day !
My grandfather helps people who have bad teeth. He's ___ dentist.
My aunt Yvette, works in a school. She's ___ teacher.
And I'm at university. I'm ___ student.
